content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
-  Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5) to store coal
-  Chest at position(x=40.5, y=-80.5) 
-  Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-81.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5) to store iron ore

### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Copper plate factory
No entities found

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when chest is full
-  Make sure to empty the chest at the drop position before continuing to mine or smelt.
### Errors when no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process.
### Errors when fuel source is full
-  Make sure to empty the fuel source before continuing to mine or smelt.
### Errors when waiting for space in destination
-  Ensure that there is enough space in the destination chest before transferring items.
### Errors when waiting for source items
-  Ensure that there are enough source items before transferring items.
